channel.title: Mele to Mage problems
channel.description: Hey there. In my server when ever you mele some one and then mage it will not do anything. You most wait for a little bit, depending on your weapon speed, to use mage. Normally you would automatically mage once you are able to, but in my server it wont do this. Can any one help? I hope I'm being clear on my problem, thanks :D
